availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Washington County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Catherine Lucetta Edelen. Father of Ally Edelen, Leonard Edelen, Eliza Edelen, and Caroline Edelen. Farmer in Washington County in 1860. Owned six enslaved persons in Washington County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Washington County, District no. 1, p. 100.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Washington County, District no. 1, p. 456.
Find A Grave, "Leonard Edelen (1803-1887)," Memorial #74025949, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/74025949(accessed October 18, 2019).
